iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

## [Discussion](/documentation/spatial/affinetransform3dfloat/matrix4x4#discussion)

Returns a 4 x 4 matrix constructed from the affine transform’s underlying matrix.
